5a13845d8bf55085c8479748.description:
+300 Health
+55 Magic Resist
+100% Base Health Regeneration
+10% Cooldown Reduction

UNIQUE Passive: Taking magic damage from a spell or effect reduces all subsequent magic damage from that same spell or effect by 15% for 4 seconds.
5a13845d8bf55085c8479748.name: Adaptive Helm

5a13845d8bf55085c8479746.description:
+400 Health
+15% Bonus Health

UNIQUE Passive - Immolate: Deals 11 (+1 per champion level) magic damage a second to nearby enemies while in combat. Deals 200% bonus damage to minions and monsters.
5a13845d8bf55085c8479746.name: Enchantment: Cinderhulk

5a13845e8bf55085c8479756.description:
+60 Ability Power
+7% Movement Speed

UNIQUE Passive - Echo: Gain charges upon moving or casting. At 100 charges, the next damaging spell hit expends all charges to deal 60 (+10% of Ability Power) bonus magic damage to up to 4 targets on hit.

This effect deals 250% damage to Large Monsters. Hitting a Large Monster with this effect will restore 18% of your missing Mana.
5a13845e8bf55085c8479756.name: Enchantment: Runic Echoes

5a13845e8bf55085c8479752.description:
Limited to 1 Jungle item

+10% Life Steal vs. Monsters
+180% Base Mana Regen while in Jungle

UNIQUE Passive - Chilling Smite: Smite can be cast on enemy champions, dealing reduced true damage and stealing 20% Movement Speed for 2 seconds.
UNIQUE Passive - Tooth / Nail: Basic attacks deal 25 bonus damage vs. monsters. Damaging a monster with a spell or attack steals 30 Health over 5 seconds. Killing monsters grants special bonus experience.
5a13845e8bf55085c8479752.name: Stalker's Blade

5a13845d8bf55085c847974a.description:
Limited to 1 Jungle item

+10% Life Steal vs. Monsters
+180% Base Mana Regen while in Jungle

Passive - Challenging Smite: Smite can be cast on enemy champions, marking them for 4 seconds. While marked, the target is revealed, your basic attacks deal bonus true damage over 3 seconds, and their damage to you is reduced by 20%.
UNIQUE Passive - Tooth / Nail: Basic attacks deal 25 bonus damage vs. monsters. Damaging a monster with a spell or attack steals 30 Health over 5 seconds. Killing monsters grants special bonus experience.
5a13845d8bf55085c847974a.name: Skirmisher's Sabre

5a13845d8bf55085c847974c.description:
Limited to 1 Jungle item

+10% Life Steal vs. Monsters
+180% Base Mana Regen while in Jungle

UNIQUE Passive - Tooth / Nail: Basic attacks deal 25 bonus damage vs. monsters. Damaging a monster with a spell or attack steals 30 Health over 5 seconds. Killing monsters grants special bonus experience.
UNIQUE Active - Warding: Consumes a charge to place a Stealth Ward that reveals the surrounding area for 150 seconds. Holds up to 2 charges which refill upon visiting the shop.

(A player may only have 3 Stealth Wards on the map at one time. Unique Passives with the same name don't stack.)
5a13845d8bf55085c847974c.name: Tracker's Knife

5a13845e8bf55085c8479750.description:
+400 Health
+15% Bonus Health

UNIQUE Passive - Immolate: Deals 7 (+2 per champion level) magic damage a second to nearby enemies while in combat. Deals 100% bonus damage to monsters.
5a13845e8bf55085c8479750.name: Enchantment: Cinderhulk

5a13845d8bf55085c8479745.description:
+60 Ability Power
+7% Movement Speed

UNIQUE Passive - Echo: Gain charges upon moving or casting. At 100 charges, the next damaging spell hit expends all charges to deal 60 (+10% of Ability Power) bonus magic damage to up to 4 targets on hit.

This effect deals 250% damage to Large Monsters. Hitting a Large Monster with this effect will restore 18% of your missing Mana.
5a13845d8bf55085c8479745.name: Enchantment: Runic Echoes

5a13845e8bf55085c8479754.description:
+425 Health
+60 Armor

UNIQUE Passive - Immolate: Deals 11 (+1 per champion level) magic damage per second to nearby enemies. Deals 200% bonus damage to minions and monsters.
5a13845e8bf55085c8479754.name: Sunfire Cape

5a13845d8bf55085c847974b.description:
+60 Ability Power
+7% Movement Speed

UNIQUE Passive - Echo: Gain charges upon moving or casting. At 100 charges, the next damaging spell hit expends all charges to deal 60 (+10% of Ability Power) bonus magic damage to up to 4 targets on hit.

This effect deals 250% damage to Large Monsters. Hitting a Large Monster with this effect will restore 18% of your missing Mana.
5a13845d8bf55085c847974b.name: Enchantment: Runic Echoes

5a13845e8bf55085c847974f.description:
+400 Health
+15% Bonus Health

UNIQUE Passive - Immolate: Deals 11 (+1 per champion level) magic damage a second to nearby enemies while in combat. Deals 200% bonus damage to minions and monsters.
5a13845e8bf55085c847974f.name: Enchantment: Cinderhulk

5a13845e8bf55085c8479755.description:
+400 Health
+15% Bonus Health

UNIQUE Passive - Immolate: Deals 11 (+1 per champion level) magic damage a second to nearby enemies while in combat. Deals 200% bonus damage to minions and monsters.
5a13845e8bf55085c8479755.name: Enchantment: Cinderhulk

5a13845e8bf55085c8479751.description:
+45 Armor
+175% Base Health Regen
+10% Cooldown Reduction
+2 Gold per 10 seconds

UNIQUE Passive - Point Runner: Builds up to +20% Movement Speed over 2 seconds while near turrets, fallen turrets and Void Gates.
UNIQUE Passive - Favor: Enemy minions killed by your allies sometimes drop coins that give either 30 gold or 8% missing mana (minimum 15). Cannon minions always drop coins.
UNIQUE Active: Grants nearby allies +40% Movement Speed for 3 seconds (60 second cooldown).
QUEST: Earn 650 gold using this item.
REWARD: Favor is upgraded to Emperor's Favor and you receive an Elixir Of Skill.

Limited to 1 Gold Income Item.

''Praise the sun.'' - Historian Shurelya, 22 September, 25 CLE
5a13845e8bf55085c8479751.name: Talisman of Ascension

5a13845e8bf55085c847974e.description:
+280 Health

UNIQUE Passive - Immolate: Deals 5 (+1 per champion level) magic damage per second to nearby enemies. Deals 50% bonus damage to minions and monsters.
5a13845e8bf55085c847974e.name: Bami's Cinder

5a13845e8bf55085c8479753.description:
+50% Base Health Regen
+10% Cooldown Reduction
+2 Gold per 10 seconds

UNIQUE Passive - Favor: Enemy minions killed by your allies sometimes drop coins that give either 30 gold or 8% missing mana (minimum 15). Cannon minions always drop coins.
QUEST: Earn 650 gold using this item.
REWARD: Favor is upgraded to Emperor's Favor and you receive an Elixir Of Skill.

Limited to 1 Gold Income Item.

''The medallion shines with the glory of a thousand voices when exposed to the sun.'' - Historian Shurelya, 22 June, 24 CLE
5a13845e8bf55085c8479753.name: Nomad's Medallion

5a13845d8bf55085c8479747.description:
+200 Health
+125% Base Health Regen
+10% Cooldown Reduction
+2 Gold per 10 seconds

UNIQUE Passive - Favor: Enemy minions killed by your allies sometimes drop coins that give either 30 gold or 8% missing mana (minimum 15). Cannon minions always drop coins.
UNIQUE Active - Warding: Consumes a charge to place a Stealth Ward that reveals the surrounding area for 150 seconds. Holds up to 4 charges which refill upon visiting the shop
QUEST: Earn 650 gold using this item.
REWARD: Favor is upgraded to Emperor's Favor and you receive an Elixir Of Skill.

Limited to 1 Gold Income Item.
5a13845d8bf55085c8479747.name: Eye of the Oasis

5a13845d8bf55085c847974d.description:
+300 Health
+65 Magic Resist
+100% Base Health Regeneration
+10% Cooldown Reduction

UNIQUE Aura: Nearby enemy champions take 10% more magic damage.
5a13845d8bf55085c847974d.name: Abyssal Mask

5a13845d8bf55085c8479749.description:
+5% Cooldown Reduction
+2 Gold per 10 seconds

UNIQUE Passive - Favor: Enemy minions killed by your allies sometimes drop coins that give either 20 gold or 8% missing mana (minimum 15). Cannon minions always drop coins.
QUEST: Earn 650 gold using this item and upgrade to Nomad's Medallion.
REWARD: Favor is upgraded to Emperor's Favor and you receive an Elixir Of Skill.

Limited to 1 Gold Income Item.

''Gold dust rises from the desert and clings to the coin.'' - Historian Shurelya, 11 November, 23 CLE
5a13845d8bf55085c8479749.name: Ancient Coin

5a1386018bf55085c847d353.description: Rek'Sai dives underground and leaps towards her target, dealing massive damage.
5a1386018bf55085c847d353.tooltip:
Passive: Dealing damage to enemy Champions marks them for the next {{ e6 }} seconds.

Active: Rek'Sai lets out a harrowing scream before burrowing underground seeking out a marked target. Moments later she leaps from underground, dealing {{ e8 }} (+{{ a2 }}) physical damage plus {{ e9 }}% of their missing Health.
5a1386018bf55085c847d353.name: Void Rush

5a1385ff8bf55085c847d34a.tooltip: Trundle coats target location with ice for {{ e4 }} seconds, gaining {{ e1 }}% Movement Speed, {{ e2 }}% Attack Speed and {{ e3 }}% increased healing and regeneration from all sources.
5a1385ff8bf55085c847d34a.name: Frozen Domain
5a1385ff8bf55085c847d34a.description: Trundle turns target location into his domain, gaining Attack Speed, Movement Speed, and increased healing from all sources while on it.

5a1386038bf55085c847d35d.description: Maokai summons a colossal wall of brambles and thorns that slowly advances forwards, damaging and rooting any enemies in the path.
5a1386038bf55085c847d35d.tooltip: Maokai summons a colossal wall of brambles and thorns that slowly advances forwards, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and rooting any enemies struck for ({{ e2 }} to {{ e2 }}) seconds, increasing with distance travelled.
5a1386038bf55085c847d35d.name: Nature's Grasp

5a1385fe8bf55085c847d349.description: Infects an area with desecrated soil, causing enemy units who stand on the location to take continual damage.
5a1385fe8bf55085c847d349.tooltip:
Curses an area for {{ e7 }} seconds. Enemies on the cursed ground are dealt
from {{ e5 }} (+{{ a1 }}) to {{ e6 }} (+{{ a2 }}) magic damage every second based on the enemy's missing Health.
5a1385fe8bf55085c847d349.name: Tormented Soil

5a1386008bf55085c847d34f.description: Deals physical damage to the target. Damage increased on <font color='#FFF673'>Isolated</font> targets. If he chooses to <font color='#00DD33'>Evolve Reaper Claws</font>, this refunds a percent of it's cooldown against <font color='#FFF673'>Isolated</font> targets. Kha'Zix also gains increased range on his basic attacks and Taste Their Fear.
5a1386008bf55085c847d34f.tooltip:
Deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage. If the target is Isolated, the damage is increased by {{ e2 }}% ({{ f1 }}).

Evolved Reaper Claws: Increases the range of Taste Their Fear and Kha'Zix's basic attacks by {{ e3 }}. If target is Isolated, refunds {{ e4 }}% of Taste Their Fear's cooldown.
5a1386008bf55085c847d34f.name: Taste Their Fear

5a1386008bf55085c847d34d.description: Shaco's Shivs passively poison targets on hit, slowing their movement speed. He can throw his Shivs to deal damage and poison the target. The thrown Shiv deals bonus damage based on the target's missing Health.
5a1386008bf55085c847d34d.tooltip:
Passive: While Two-Shiv Poison is ready to cast, Shaco's basic attacks apply Two-Shiv Poison for {{ e4 }} seconds. It reduces Movement Speed by {{ e2 }}%.

Active: Shaco throws a shiv that applies Two-Shiv Poison for {{ e5 }} seconds and deals magic damage equal to {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) (+{{ a1 }}) + {{ f2 }}% of the target's missing Health.
5a1386008bf55085c847d34d.name: Two-Shiv Poison

5a1386018bf55085c847d356.description:
Gnar throws a boomerang that damages and slows enemies it hits before returning to him. If he catches the boomerang its cooldown is reduced.

Mega Gnar instead throws a boulder that stops on the first unit hit, damaging and slowing everything nearby. It can then be picked up to reduce the cooldown.
5a1386018bf55085c847d356.tooltip:
Mini Gnar: Throws a boomerang that deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage and slows enemies by {{ e3 }}% for {{ e4 }} seconds. The boomerang returns towards Gnar after hitting an enemy, dealing {{ e7 }}% damage to subsequent targets. Each enemy can only be hit once. Catching the boomerang reduces its cooldown by {{ f1 }}%.

Mega Gnar: Throws a boulder that stops when it hits an enemy, slowing all nearby enemies and dealing {{ e2 }} (+{{ a2 }}) physical damage. Picking up the boulder reduces its cooldown by {{ e6 }}%.
5a1386018bf55085c847d356.name: Boomerang Throw / Boulder Toss

5a1386008bf55085c847d350.tooltip:
Passive: Ranking up Void Assault allows Kha'Zix to evolve one of his abilities.

Active: Kha'Zix becomes Invisible for {{ e1 }} seconds and activates Unseen Threat. While Invisible, he gains {{ e3 }}% movement speed and ignores unit collision. Void Assault can be cast a second time within {{ e2 }} seconds.

Evolved Adaptive Cloaking: While out of combat, Kha'Zix also passively gains Void Assault for {{ e5 }} seconds in brush. This persists for up to {{ f1 }} seconds after exiting the brush ({{ f1 }} second per brush cooldown).

16
5a1386008bf55085c847d350.name: Void Assault
5a1386008bf55085c847d350.description: Each rank allows Kha'Zix to evolve one of his abilities, giving it a unique additional effect. When activated, Kha'Zix becomes <font color='#91d7ee'>Invisible</font>, triggering Unseen Threat and increasing Movement Speed. If he chooses to <font color='#00DD33'>Evolve Adaptive Cloaking</font>, while out of combat Kha'Zix also passively gains Void Assault upon entering a new brush.

5a1386018bf55085c847d358.description: Kennen passively deals extra damage and adds a Mark of the Storm to his target every few attacks, and he can activate this ability to damage and add another Mark of the Storm to targets who are already marked.
5a1386018bf55085c847d358.tooltip:
Passive: Every 5 attacks, Kennen deals bonus magic damage equal to {{ e2 }}% of his attack damage and adds a Mark of the Storm to his target.

Active: Sends a surge of electricity through all nearby enemies affected by Mark of the Storm or Slicing Maelstrom, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage.
5a1386018bf55085c847d358.name: Electrical Surge

5a1386028bf55085c847d35b.description: Damages target enemy unit and flings them into the air behind Singed. If the target Singed flings lands in his Mega Adhesive, they are also rooted.
5a1386028bf55085c847d35b.tooltip:
Singed flings an enemy over his shoulder, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) plus {{ e3 }}% of the target's maximum Health as magic damage. Max 300 bonus damage against minions and monsters.

If the target Singed flings lands in his Mega Adhesive, they are also rooted for {{ e2 }} seconds.
5a1386028bf55085c847d35b.name: Fling

5a1386018bf55085c847d355.description: Rammus goes into a defensive formation, vastly increasing his Armor and Magic Resistance, amplifying Spiked Shells' damage, and returning damage to enemies that basic attack him, but he is also slowed during this time.
5a1386018bf55085c847d355.tooltip:
Rammus enters a defensive formation for up to {{ e3 }} seconds, increasing Armor and Magic Resist by {{ e1 }} plus {{ e6 }}% ({{ f1 }}/{{ f2 }}) but becoming slowed by {{ e5 }}%.

During this time, Spiked Shell deals {{ e4 }}% damage and also deals its damage to enemies that basic attack Rammus.

Can be reactivated to end the effect early and put Defensive Ball Curl on cooldown.
5a1386018bf55085c847d355.name: Defensive Ball Curl

5a1385ff8bf55085c847d34b.tooltip:
Passive: Attacking a Vulnerable target increases Quinn's Attack Speed by {{ e2 }}% and Movement Speed by {{ e3 }}% for {{ e1 }} seconds.

Active: Valor reveals a large area nearby for {{ e5 }} seconds.
5a1385ff8bf55085c847d34b.name: Heightened Senses
5a1385ff8bf55085c847d34b.description: Passively grants Quinn Attack Speed and Movement Speed after she attacks a <font color='#FFF673'>Vulnerable</font> target. Activate to have Valor reveal a large area nearby.

5a1386018bf55085c847d359.description: Kennen morphs into a lightning form, enabling him to pass through units. Each enemy unit he touches takes damage and receives a Mark of the Storm.
5a1386018bf55085c847d359.tooltip:
Kennen doubles his base movement speed and ignores unit collision for 2 seconds, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to any enemy he passes through. Additionally, Kennen will gain {{ e2 }} Armor and Magic Resist for 4 seconds.

Kennen gains 40 Energy the first time he passes through an enemy.
Lightning Rush deals half damage to minions.
5a1386018bf55085c847d359.name: Lightning Rush

5a1386038bf55085c847d35e.description: Lamb fires a carefully placed shot, slowing the target. If Lamb attacks the target two more times, her third attack instead directs Wolf to pounce on the enemy, savaging them for massive damage.
5a1386038bf55085c847d35e.tooltip:
Cripple an enemy, slowing their movement speed by {{ e2 }}% for {{ e8 }} second.

After Lamb attacks the target twice, her third attack instead directs Wolf to pounce on the enemy, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) plus {{ f2 }}% of the target's missing health as bonus physical damage.

Wolf's attack critically strikes targets for {{ e6 }}% increased damage if they are below {{ e5 }}% (+{{ f3 }}%) health (Increased by Critical Strike Chance).

[Maximum {{ e0 }} vs. monsters]
5a1386038bf55085c847d35e.name: Mounting Dread

5a1386028bf55085c847d35c.description: Twisted Fate throws three cards, dealing damage to each enemy unit they pass through.
5a1386028bf55085c847d35c.tooltip: Throws three cards that deal {{ e1 }} <scaleAP>(+{{ a1 }})</scaleAP> Magic Damage to each enemy unit they pass through.
5a1386028bf55085c847d35c.name: Wild Cards

5a1386008bf55085c847d34c.description: Shaco creates a hidden animated Jack-in-the-Box. When triggered, it will fear and attack nearby enemies.
5a1386008bf55085c847d34c.tooltip:
Shaco creates a Jack in the Box that hides from view after {{ e5 }} seconds. It pops out when an enemy comes near or when uncovered by a ward or trinket, making nearby enemies flee very slowly for {{ e3 }} seconds.

Its attacks deal {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage. It lasts for {{ e4 }} (+{{ a2 }}) seconds while hidden or 5 seconds while firing.
5a1386008bf55085c847d34c.name: Jack In The Box

5a1386018bf55085c847d354.description: Rammus accelerates in a ball towards his enemies, dealing damage and slowing targets affected by the impact.
5a1386018bf55085c847d354.tooltip:
Rammus accelerates in a ball, gaining up to {{ f2 }}% Movement Speed over {{ e4 }} seconds. On enemy collision, he stops, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to nearby enemies, knocking them back, and slowing them by {{ e2 }}% for {{ e3 }} second.

Can be reactivated to end the effect early and put Powerball on cooldown.
Powerball is a channeled spell and is subject to interruption by spells that prevent casting.
5a1386018bf55085c847d354.name: Powerball

5a1386008bf55085c847d34e.description: Shaco creates an illusion of himself near him, which can attack nearby enemies (Deals reduced damage to turrets).  Upon death, it explodes, spawning three mini Jack in the Boxes and dealing damage to nearby enemies.
5a1386008bf55085c847d34e.tooltip:
Shaco vanishes briefly and reappears with a clone. The clone lasts up to 18 seconds and detonates when it dies, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to nearby enemies and spawning three mini Jack in the Boxes.

  • Mini boxes deal {{ e6 }} (+{{ a2 }}) damage, make enemies flee for {{ e7 }} second(s), and trigger together.

    Clone deals {{ e8 }}% of Shaco's damage and receives {{ e2 }}% increased damage.

    • The clone can be controlled by holding the alt key and using the right mouse button or by reactivating this ability.
5a1386008bf55085c847d34e.name: Hallucinate

5a1386028bf55085c847d35a.description: Galio fires two windblasts that converge into a large tornado.
5a1386028bf55085c847d35a.tooltip:
Galio fires two windblasts that deal {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage.

When the windblasts meet, they combine into a giant tornado that deals {{ e5 }} (+{{ charabilitypower2*3 }}) plus {{ e2 }}% of enemies' maximum Health (max {{ e4 }} vs. monsters) as magic damage over {{ e3 }} seconds.
5a1386028bf55085c847d35a.name: Winds of War

5a1386018bf55085c847d357.tooltip:
Mini Gnar: Leaps to a location, gaining {{ e2 }}% Attack Speed for {{ e3 }} seconds. If Gnar lands on a unit he will bounce off it, traveling further. Deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) [6% of Gnar's Max Health] physical damage and slows briefly if the unit landed on was an enemy.

Mega Gnar: Leaps to a location and deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) [6% of Gnar's Max Health] physical damage to nearby enemies on landing. Enemies Gnar lands directly on top of are slowed briefly.

If Crunch is used to transform, Gnar will still be able to bounce.
5a1386018bf55085c847d357.name: Hop / Crunch
5a1386018bf55085c847d357.description:
Gnar leaps to a location and bounces off the head of any unit he lands on, traveling further.

Mega Gnar is too large to bounce and instead lands with earth-shattering force, dealing damage in an area around him.

5a1386008bf55085c847d351.description: Poppy swings her hammer, dealing damage and creating a zone that will slow enemies and explode after a delay.
5a1386008bf55085c847d351.tooltip:
Poppy smashes the ground, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) plus {{ e5 }}% of the enemies' maximum Health as physical damage, and leaving an unstable area.

The area slows enemies inside it by {{ e3 }}% and erupts after {{ e4 }} second, dealing the initial damage again.
5a1386008bf55085c847d351.name: Hammer Shock

5a1386018bf55085c847d352.description:
Rek'Sai burrows into the ground, gaining new abilities and increased Movement Speed. Her vision range is reduced and she cannot use basic attacks.

While Burrowed, Rek'Sai may cast Un-burrow to knock up and damage nearby enemies.
5a1386018bf55085c847d352.tooltip:
Un-Burrowed: Burrow into the ground.

Burrowed: Un-burrow, dealing {{ e2 }} (+{{ a1 }}) Physical Damage and knocking up the closest enemy for {{ e5 }} second. All other nearby enemies will be knocked back. An enemy who has been knocked up will be immune from further Un-burrow effects for {{ e6 }} seconds.

Burrowed Effects: New abilities, +{{ f1 }} Movement Speed, reduced vision range, disabled basic attacks, and gains Tremor Sense: Nearby enemies that move in Fog of War have their position revealed to Rek'Sai and her allies.
5a1386018bf55085c847d352.name: Burrow / Un-burrow
